activities: Paymetric collects personal information on its web site, We use this information to contact current and potential clients about the services on our site in which the contact have expressed interest. We provide opt-out capability for the contact personal information to be removed. Additionally, we collect minimum personal information from our clients customers as part of payment authorization or settlement through Paymetric transactional service
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
personaldata: data collected directly on the Internet
